overview: Welcome in Little-Tokyo, a small part of the city Rosepillow on the Island of Tol'Andar, where the 18-years old Churippu lives with his family on their Cottage.  His father will be on a business travel and will leave his family again. His Mom will not believe the fact, that there's no man in the house... or it is? ;)  Drink a taste of sake and find out!
title: Konshinsokan
